With some copies, booklet includes a list of the top-200 soundtracks available on the VarÃƒÂ¨se Sarabande label. 

Track 14, although listed in the "Return of the Jedi" section, actually belongs to "Star Wars". 

Total Time: 50:27 

About This Recording 
This Soundstream digital recording was made direct to two-channel at the Utah Symphony Orchestra's acoustically-acclaimed Symphony Hall in Salt Lake City on July 19-20, 1983. Four Schoeps CMC 3U microphones with MK-2 capsules provided by the principal pickup, deployed across the front of the orchestra at a height of ten feet. AKG 414's as well as Neumann KM-86's were discreetly employed as "sweeteners". Monitors for the sessions were ADS BC-8's.
